Шикарная игра. Даже в 2021 графика неплохая. Прошел всю сюжетку и могу уверенно сказать что если вы никогда не играли в Portal то уверенно покупайте 1 и 2 часть, точно не пожалеете. На счет кооперативной игры могу сказать что играть не надоедает, можно пройти все камеры буквально за 2 вечера. В общем игра очень классная.

Portal 2 espande la meccanica di gioco del primo aggiungendo nuove ambientazioni, puzzle dagli stili differenti, molto umorismo, un compagno d'avventura a suo modo tragico, una trama intrigante e una colonna sonora perfetta.

Pros: bello bello in modo assurdo.
Cons: the cake is a lie.

Portal 2 is a puzzle game done right. it is a 2nd that was needed, the game is well made and all round really fun, the portal gun is used in so many cool and fun ways, making you go SPEED, go through the air, transport objects, and much much more, i got this game and portal 1 for a total of 4$ and it's the best purchase i ever made.

another thing to consider it all the portal 2 mods. they're awesome, Portal: stories mel is my favourite, tons of plot, challenging, 10/10. portal reloaded includes a 3rd portal (hasn't come out yet, will in april 2021!) aperture tag is another good one, does cost money though.

even though being a 10 year old game, the graphics hold up and the community is amazing, seriously! watch a speedrun that stuffs INSANE.

i rate this game a 10/10

But i wish the final boss had fat mommy milkers.
good game
YES

Game very good, a lot of fps on a weak-medium pc, but there are maps in the workshop where you will have 70-150 fps on a weak pc. The plot of the game is elaborated, the scenery of the level adds a special look, especially chapters 1-4. The scenery of the old laboratory is very good, but in Portal Stories Mel is better for me.

Second got so far in both graphic and gameplay assets from the first game and I love it
Portal 2 is the only game I've been re-playing for the 50th time on my old xbox while getting exactly the same feelings from it as for the first time
I miss the times when I was watching youtube gameplays of it while playing it myself, so buying it for my pc gives me a nice call from the past
Being able to play community chambers made me extremly excited as i was running through the unknown chambers without knowing what will wait for me there
To sum all of that up, for me Portal 2 is the best Valve game. Big thanks to developers for making it

It's portal 2. not just one of the best sequels but I'd go as far as to say one of the best games. It's fun, funny, depressing as hell. it's great. I would recommend this to most people. it's never too difficult while still providing a challenge. I've beaten it at least 20 times since it was released. 10/10
NICE

[b] Portal 2 [/b] is a classic puzzle game that literally anyone can enjoy. There are some aspects of this game that I liked and just a few aspects that I didn't like about the game.

[b] I'll start off listing the positives: [/b]
+ Great game play and mechanics.
+ Tons of community content to play.
+ Co-op is worth playing.
+ Good for all ages and all different types of gamers.

[b] Here are some negatives that come to mind:  [/b]
- Story too short for my liking. Only took about 6 hours to beat.
- Some of the puzzles were too simple, even late into the story.
- Game froze a few times while loading some community maps. 

I played this game when it first came out in 2011, decided to play it again 10 years later in 2021. Still holds up pretty well if you look past the graphics and the basic gameplay mechanics. During my play through I noticed this time around it was much easier to beat, maybe because I'm older or I recall how I beat the puzzles in the past..who knows? Still a great game made by Valve, hopefully Portal 3 will come within the next decade!

Overall this is a solid puzzle game and I do recommend it to most.
My Rating: ★★★☆☆ 3 / 5

1) Про сюжет ничего не скажу, выкусите, потому что он сасный, и я настоятельно рекомендую его пройти самому
2) Кооператив сасный, но я скажу одно - если вы хотите прям реально угарнуть, рекомендую это делать абсолютно сонным, ведь в эти моменты начитается дикий вопль полумертвого мозга, и вам ничего не остается кроме того что рофлить с себя и своего друга за... ну прям тупые моменты.
3) В принципе казуальщина, но разве это не перестает быть конфеткой?
